description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders

description.narrative: Sustained evidence-based media and social media advocacy has contributed to created creating an enabling environment, and positioning UNICEF as a knowledge leader. Reach and increasing reach of key messages on priority children's issues in Tanzania increased through convening key stakeholders and providing updated information on key issues affecting children in Tanzania for action. Over 34,000 young people came together to develop their Agenda for the Tanzania and discussed it with different influencers and decision makers paving the way for a multistakeholder partnership for GenU in Tanzania. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: No. of initiatives that engage civil society partners and/or coalitions to advocate together with UNICEF for children (events)

baseline.value: 19 events where resources incl gratis time, voluntary participation of influencers was leveraged

title.narrative: No. of sustained advocacy initiatives with business stakeholders
No. of initiatives that engage civil society partners and/or coalitions to advocate together with UNICEF for children (partnerships)
No. of key influencers equipped with clear advocacy messages on specific topics

baseline.value: 6 knowledge products made available to influencers for advocacy through different platforms 4 briefing sessions/ sensitization events

target.value: 2021:15 knowledge products made available to influencers for advocacy through different platforms 16 briefing sessions/ sensitization events
